original_text: “If anyone sins, doing any of the things that by the Lord's commandments ought not to be done, though he did not know it, then realizes his guilt, he shall bear his iniquity.
korean_text: 만일 누구든지 여호와의 계명 중 하나를 부지중에 범하여도 허물이라 벌을 당할 것이니

sentences.original_text: that by the Lord's commandments ought not to be done,
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 명령으로 하지 말아야 할 것들을,

sentences.original_text: though he did not know it,
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 자기가 그것을 알지 못하였다 할지라도,
